title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data Lifecycle Management - Classic EAC features migrating to Microsoft Purview compliance portal

description.newValue:
Information governance features currently available in the Classic Exchange admin center (Classic EAC) - including Retention policies, Retention tags, and Journal rules - are moving to the Microsoft Purview compliance portal and will be available as part of the Data Lifecycle Management solution.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/data-lifecycle-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: August CY2022
